comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Could be Elmore W. Hurst, "An able lawyer, a successful financier, and a man recognized as a state leader in Illinois Democracy, is Elmore W. Hurst, of Rock Island, one of the senior members of the legal firm of Jackson, Hurst & Stafford." from www.accessgenealogy.com/scripts/data/database.cgi?file=Da... He died in 1915. NYT obituary is at query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9500E6DA153AE633A...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elmore_W._Hurst
